snippet: Republican politicians gathered at the N.R.A. convention are eagerly pandering to a powerful political lobby that is intent on making the nation’s gun laws weaker.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican politicians gathering at the National Rifle Association convention for eagerly pandering to a powerful political lobby that is intent on making the nation’s gun laws weaker.
